name: stager
build: if [ "$BUILD_EXE" = "yes" ]; then make stager_exe LISTENER_TYPE=$LISTENER_TYPE; else make stager_so LISTENER_TYPE=$LISTENER_TYPE; fi
author: jm33-ng
comment: A Linux stager that supports payload delivery via HTTP/TCP/UDP with encryption and compression. Use with emp3r0r-listener

BUILD_EXE.opt_desc: Build stager as an executable, otherwise a shared object will be built

LISTENER_TYPE.opt_desc: Listener protocol type: HTTP, TCP, or UDP

ARCH.opt_desc: The architecture of the target system, use GOARCH values

DOWNLOAD_HOST.opt_desc: The host to download the payload from, eg. 192.168.0.1

DOWNLOAD_PORT.opt_desc: The port to download the payload from, eg. 8000

DOWNLOAD_PATH.opt_desc: The path to download the payload from (HTTP only), eg. /payload

DOWNLOAD_KEY.opt_desc: The key to decrypt the payload
